description.value: This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource [RequestGroup](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/RequestGroup.html).

purpose.value: This profile is the result of NHS England Digital and Interoperable Medicines Programme requiring RequestGroup to allow for multiple routes of prescription.
